word: Those who have helped souls to feel at liberty to specify what is of God in the Testimonies and what are the uninspired words of Sister White, will find that they were helping the devil in his work of deception. Please read Testimony No. 33, page 211, "How to Receive Reproof."--Letter 28, 1906, p. 2. (To Brother George Amadon, January 15, 1906.)
